text: The women's football tournament at the 2008 Summer Olympics was held held in Beijing and 4 other cities in the China. The tournament had 12 teams. The group stage began two days before the opening ceremony, August 6. The United States won the tournament against Brazil, winning their 3rd olympic gold medal. == Qualification == The following teams qualified: * China (Host nation) * Japan * North Korea * Nigeria * United States * Canada * Argentina * New Zealand * Germany * Norway * Sweden * Brazil == Group stage == === Group E === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts China 3 2 1 0 5 2 +3 7 Sweden 3 2 0 1 4 3 +1 6 Canada 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 Argentina 3 0 0 3 1 5 –4 0 === Group F === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Brazil 3 2 1 0 5 2 +3 7 Germany 3 2 1 0 2 0 +2 7 North Korea 3 1 0 2 2 3 –1 3 Nigeria 3 0 0 3 1 5 –4 0 === Group G === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts United States 3 2 0 1 5 2 +3 6 Norway 3 2 0 1 4 5 –1 6 Japan 3 1 1 1 7 4 +3 4 New Zealand 3 0 1 2 2 7 –5 1 === Ranking of third place teams === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Japan 3 1 1 1 7 4 +3 4 Canada 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 North Korea 3 1 0 2 2 3 –1 3 == Knockout stage == The games had a single-elimination format. When a team lost a match, the tournament was ended for them. In other words, when a team won, the women continued to play until only one team remained as the Olympic champion. {{quote box|style=margin-left: 4em|quote=: {{Round8 |15 August – Tianjin| Brazil|2| Norway|1 |15 August – Shenyang| Sweden|0| Germany|2 |15 August – Qinhuangdao| China|0| Japan|2 |15 August – Shanghai| United States|2| Canada|1 |18 August – Shanghai| Brazil|4| Germany|1 |18 August – Beijing| Japan|2| United States|4 |21 August – Beijing| Brazil|0| United States|1 }} }} The US and Brazilian women won the opportunity to compete for the gold medal and the Olympic championship. === Bronze medal match === === Gold medal match === Rank Team 1 United States 2 Brazil 3 Germany 4 Japan == Statistics == * Top scorer : Cristiane * Own goal : Gunhild Følstad ==Related pages== * 2008 Summer Olympics ==References== Category:2008 Summer Olympics 2008 Category:2008 in association football
title: Football at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Women's tournament
